ctxs.title: RAG for NLP Tasks
ctxs.text: RAG models combine pre-trained parametric memory with non-parametric memory (dense vector index) for language generation, accessing external knowledge during inference.

data.output: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) combines the strengths of both retrieval-based and generative models by leveraging a dense vector index to retrieve relevant information from an external corpus and then using this information as input for a generator model [0]. This approach allows RAG models to access external knowledge during inference, enabling them to generate more informative and accurate text while still maintaining the ability to generate novel responses.
